controllers

Class CalibrationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.CalibrationController

  • public class CalibrationController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class calibrates the light and color sensors
    Since:
    02-04-2014 This class calibrates both Light and MyColorSensor for further usage.
    Version:
    1.5
    Author:
    Pim van Hespen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor for the CalibrationController class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calibrateAllSensors()
      This class will calibrate all given Sensors, as of now there are only two Sensors: one MyColorSensor and one Lightsensor.

      • calibrateAllSensors

        public void calibrateAllSensors()
        This class will calibrate all given Sensors, as of now there are only two Sensors: one MyColorSensor and one Lightsensor.
